title: Annihilate
description: An epic conclusion to the Hive Trilogy by two USA Today bestselling authors.  There are two things Charlie Bennett despises: bullies and vampires. Which in her experience, is really the same thing. After the battle with the Quorum, she's left with no other option. The vampire's rule must end. But when more shocking secrets are uncovered Charlie wonders if she'll be alive long enough to follow through with her plan.  *Age 17+ recommended for language
author: Jaymin Eve
